metadata.title: Araucarioides: A Polar Lineage of Araucariaceae with the New Paleogene Fossils from Tasmania, Australia

authors_verbatim: Slodownik Miriam A.; Escapa Ignacio; Mays Chris; Jordan Gregory J.; Carpenter Raymond J.; Hill Robert S.

labels.rationale:
Palaeobotanical study of
Araucarioides fossils from the Macquarie Harbour 
Formation (Tasmania, 
Early Eocene). Uses SEM 
and micro-CT imaging at 
University of Adelaide / 
Cork / ANU collaborators.

No CMCA acknowledgement,
co-authors, or affiliations.
